m2vAdapter - Variable in class model.BallModel
The model-to-view adapter is initialized to a no-op to insure that system always has well-defined behavior.

MarioSonicImagePaintStrategy - Class in model.paint.strategy
Paint strategy that uses either an animated Mario or Sonic image.
MarioSonicImagePaintStrategy() - Constructor for class model.paint.strategy.MarioSonicImagePaintStrategy
No-parameter constructor that instantiates the AffineTransform used internally and the following files with a 50% probability: model\paint\strategy\images\Sonic_animate.gif or model\paint\strategy\images\Mario_animate.gif with a fill factor of 0.5.
max - Variable in class model.strategy.GravityStrategy
The number of timer cycles to wait before updating state.
